Activity: Arrive at the hospital and check emails. Drink coffee and read news.
Review the feedback received from @pchmp-1 on the draft physician examination workflow. Make necessary revisions and improvements.

Contact @ehrdev-1, @ehrdev-2 to schedule a meeting to discuss the technical aspects of implementing the updated nursing assessment and physician examination workflows in the EHR system. @PEOPLE: EHR Implementation Discussion

Lunch Break. Sharing gossips with other colleagues.
Follow up with @ehrv-1 regarding any updates or changes to the EHR system that may impact the implementation of the workflows. @PEOPLE: EHR System Updates

Review the training materials with @rn-1 and @pchmp-1 to gather feedback and ensure accuracy. @PEOPLE: Review of Training Materials
Make necessary revisions to the training materials based on the feedback received. Communicate with all the members about tomorrow's plan.
